description: The Giant Lily (Cardiocrinum giganteum) is an amazing species of plant. It is one of the largest lily plants in the world, growing to impressive heights of up to six feet. Its bell-shaped, white flowers are also stunningly beautiful, blossoming in summer and providing a breathtaking sight. This amazing plant is also known to be quite hardy, surviving in climates as cold as USDA Zone 5 and thriving in moist conditions. Additionally, it has a long bloom period, making it a great choice for landscaping. With its impressive size and beauty, the Giant Lily is an amazing species that can make any garden or landscape look truly amazing.
